apparel_category: All Skirts, Dresses, Gowns, Slips & Robes

clothing_length_style.description: Descriptive terms for where on the lower-body a garment ends.

summary: This section outlines additional mandatory attributes for skirts, dresses, gowns, slips, and robes, specifically focusing on clothing length style. It includes a key and description for 'clothingLengthStyle', listing various acceptable terms for garment lengths.
